definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Rack and pinion telescoping section ensures proper load alignment.
sentences.chinese: 齿轮齿条套车部件，保证荷载同轴。
从齿条活塞上拆下工具。

sentences.english: And has studied this medium rack tooth profile curve structure method.
sentences.chinese: 并研究了这种媒介齿条齿廓齿形曲线的构造方法。

sentences.english: The spring presses through the briquetting the rack depending in the gear, guarantees ceaseless meshing.
sentences.chinese: 弹簧通过压块将齿条压靠在齿轮上，保证无间隙啮合。

sentences.english: The present invention provides a cervical collar with a rack and pinion adjustment mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供了一种具有齿条和小齿轮调整机构的颈圈。

sentences.english: A dual rack paper-pushing device on paper cutting machine.
sentences.chinese: 切纸机的双齿条推纸机构。

sentences.english: In-phase gear width - adjusting system, ensure guide rail parallel.
sentences.chinese: 同步齿条调宽结构，可确保导轨调宽平行度。

sentences.english: The fuel rack requires little force to accomplish its motion.
sentences.chinese: 油泵齿条几乎毋须费力就能使之移动。

sentences.english: Rack & pinion tracks for quick adjustment for extended mandrels.
sentences.chinese: 齿条齿轮跟踪系统可快速调节凸出的轴。

sentences.english: In Spa the steering rack broke.
The most common are rack-and-pinion and recirculating ball.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的有齿轮齿条式和循环球式。

definition: (of opposing teeth, or gears) to mesh/to engage
